question: Who of the follwing was crowned as 'Miss India USA 2017' recently?
explanation: Shree Saini was crowned 'Miss India USA 2017' at the pageant held at Royal Alberts Palace in Edison, New Jersey. Shree Saini is a resident of Washington state. She is 21 years old. She is a student at the University of Washington and an anti-bullying activist. First runner up for this title was Prachi Singh from Connecticut. Second runner-up was Fareena from North Carolina.
